Arguments.Name: -resolvePackageDependencies

Arguments.Description: Prevents packages from automatically being resolved to versions other than those recorded in the `Package.resolved` file

Arguments.Name: -json
Arguments.Description: Output as JSON

Arguments.Name: -allowProvisioningUpdates
Arguments.Description: Allow xcodebuild to communicate with the Apple Developer website. For automatically signed targets, xcodebuild will create and update profiles, app IDs, and certificates. For manually signed targets, xcodebuild will download missing or updated provisioning profiles. Requires a developer account to have been added in Xcode's Accounts preference pane

Arguments.Name: -allowProvisioningDeviceRegistration
Arguments.Description: Allow xcodebuild to register your destination device on the developer portal if necessary. This flag only takes effect if -allowProvisioningUpdates is also passed

Arguments.Description: Which implementation to use for Git operations (system/xcode)

Arguments.Name: -showBuildTimingSummary
Arguments.Description: Display a report of the timings of all the commands invoked during the build

Arguments.Name: -create-xcframework
Arguments.Description: Create an xcframework from prebuilt libraries; -help for more information

Arguments.Name: build
Arguments.Description: Build the target in the build root (SYMROOT).  This is the default build action

Arguments.Name: installsrc
Arguments.Description: Copy the source of the project to the source root (SRCROOT)

Arguments.Name: install
Arguments.Description: Build the target and install it into the target's installation directory in the distribution root (DSTROOT)

Arguments.Name: clean
Arguments.Description: Remove build products and intermediate files from the build root (SYMROOT)
